Ecuación compensadora…

# Chiapas

$$ P_{2022} = P_{2020} + N_{t \rightarrow 2000-2000} +I_{t \rightarrow 2000-2000} -E_{t \rightarrow 2000-2000}$$

<font size="1.5">  
$$ Pob_{2000}=5543828$$
 $$Pob_{2000}= 3920892	$$
 $$N_{2000-2020}= 98098+136890)/2=117494$$
 $$D_{2000-2020}= (38566+14921)/2=26743.5$$
 $$I_{2000-2020}= (174961+122451)/2= 148706$$
 $$E_{2000-2020}= (336140+678362)/2 =507251$$
 
  $$ P_{2022} = 3920892 + 117494-26743.5+148706 -507251$$ </font> 

## TASA DE CRECIMIENTO ANUAL

$$ TCA= \frac{P_{2020}-P_{2000}}{P_{2000}}  $$
$$ Pob_{2020}=5543828$$
 $$Pob_{2000}= 3920892	$$
  $$ TCA= \frac{5543828-3920892}{3920892} = 0.4139201 $$ </font> 

## TASA DE CRECIMIENTO EXPONENCIAL

$$ r = \frac{ \ln\left(\frac{P_{t+n}}{P_{t}}\right)}{n} $$

$$ r = \frac{ \ln\left(\frac{5543828}{3920892}\right)}{20}=0.0173183029 $$
